title: Sunny Meadow Cottage
description: A spacious 5-bedroom family home in East Legon, within easy reach of the University of Ghana and major shopping. Secure compound and peaceful neighbourhood.

title: Coastal Breeze Villa
description: A coastal villa with sweeping sea views near Labadi Beach. Close to restaurants and convenient access to the business district.

title: Citralan Puri Serang
description: Modern 4-bedroom residence in Ahodwo with a large compound and quick access to Kumasi city centre and Kumasi City Mall.

title: Autumn Mist Cottage
description: A charming 3-bedroom family home in Tema Community 18. Quiet street, well finished interiors and a neat compound.

title: Rustic Pine Lodge
description: A comfortable 4-bedroom home in Cape Coast — ideal for families looking for seaside living with easy access to town centers and schools.

title: Rolling Hills Retreat
description: A serene 3-bedroom bungalow in Aburi with hillside views and cool climate — perfect for weekend retreats or remote work.

title: Riverstone Manor
description: Elegant 4-bedroom home in Sunyani with modern finishes and a secure compound, close to the main market and transport links.

title: Summerhill Estate
description: Two-storey house located in Gumo, Tamale. Spacious rooms and a landscaped compound — convenient for professionals and families.

title: Crimson Peak Chalet
description: Beachfront-style 4-bedroom home in Prampram — ideal for beach lovers and short-stay rentals. Easy access to main coastal roads.

title: Cedar Ridge Ranch
description: A modern 3-bedroom family home in Ho with a spacious compound and contemporary finishes. Close to the Ho central market.

title: Modern Marvel Mansion
description: Spacious modern mansion in Madina with premium finishes, large compound and convenient access to Accra-North transport links.

title: Whispering Willow Estate
description: Comfortable 4-bedroom family home in Kasoa, ideal for growing families — close to markets and schools with easy Accra access.

title: Blue Horizon Manor
description: A well-appointed 3-bedroom house in Santasi, Kumasi. Quiet residential area with great neighbourhood amenities.

title: Golden Fields Ranch
description: A 4-bedroom family home in Dansoman with a large compound and good road access — ideal for families and small businesses.

title: Asatti Garden City
description: A modest 3-bedroom home in Adenta — good value for families working in Accra North, with quick access to the N4.

title: Jansheen villan
description: A deluxe 4-bedroom villa in Kwadaso, Kumasi with modern fittings and a large compound — suitable for large families.

title: The Johnson Palace
description: Well-located 2-bedroom home in Airport Residential Area, close to Kotoka International Airport and major embassies.
address: 3 Airport Residential Crescent, Airport Residential Area

title: ZKC Villa
description: A modern 5-bedroom home in Tanoso with large rooms and a well-kept garden. Close to Tanoso market and main transport links.

title: Beautiful House
description: Spacious and well-finished 5-bedroom home in Labone, within easy reach of Oxford Street and major dining options.
